label: ham
subject: Re: [R] Problem with RSVGTipsDevice
body: 20 (return) [ See the artful Bossuet, (Hist. des Variations des Eglises Protestantes, tom. iii. p. 210-258.) and the malicious Bayle, (tom ii. p. 820.) I _name_ Bayle, for he was certainly the author of the Avis aux Refugies; consult the Dictionnaire Critique de ChauffepiŽ, tom. i. part ii. p. 145.]
